official_title: To increase the amount of student loans that may be forgiven for service as a teacher in a school with a high concentration of low-income students.

summary.text: Teacher Loan Forgiveness Act of 2000 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise the teacher student loan forgiveness program to increase from $5,000 to$12,800 the aggregate amount of an individual teacher's student loan obligation which may be forgiven.
